dataList.name: Paired Assault
dataList.desc: When an ally deals damage by striking an enemy, use the Skill 'Weakness Thrust' as an Unopposed Attack after the ally's attack ends (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Aiding Stab
dataList.desc: When an enemy attacks an other ally, and if the allied unit has less than 25% HP after the attack, use the Skill 'Aiding Strike' as an Unopposed Attack against the attacker (once per Encounter)

dataList.name: Siphoning Fulfillment
dataList.desc: Turn End: gain 1 Defense Level Up next turn for every 3 Poise on self (max 6)

dataList.name: Morale Boost
dataList.desc: On Kill, heal 10 SP for 2 Sinners with the least SP
